projects.name: Virtual Piano
projects.description: A virtual piano that can be played with the keyboard or a connected MIDI Piano. It also supports recording and playing back your performance.

projects.name: NASA Image Search
projects.description: A web app that allows you to search for images from NASA's image API.

projects.name: Conways Game Of Life
projects.description: Simulation of Conways Game of Life with various presets and controls.

projects.name: Cookie Clicker
projects.description: My take on the popular Cookie Clicker game. Click the cookie to gain points and buy upgrades.

projects.name: Cookie Clicker 2
projects.description: A technically improved (but still a little buggy) version of my first Cookie Clicker game in Angular. Click the cookie to gain points and buy upgrades.

projects.name: Value Table
projects.description: A web app that allows you to create a table of values for a function. You can also filter the table with logical expressions.

projects.name: Counters

projects.name: Calculator
projects.description: Very basic calculator application. Supports keyboard input.
